footer.aboutText: Since 2007, onecompany has been shaping the culture of premium tuning: over 12,000 satisfied customers, hundreds of custom projects, and uncompromising post-installation support.

about.intro: Since 2007, we have been shaping the culture of premium tuning: 12,000+ satisfied customers, hundreds of individual projects, and uncompromising support after installation.

brandsPage.title: Brands
brandsPage.logoDisclaimer: Logos shown where available – others use a placeholder until assets are added.

landing.welcomeText: OneCompany has been active since 2007 as a distributor for premium aftermarket brands in the automotive & motorcycle industry. We've built strong relationships with trusted partners across Ukraine and beyond.
landing.expertSelectionDesc: Our team of specialists provides personalized consultations to select the perfect performance parts for your specific vehicle and requirements.
landing.globalNetworkDesc: Access to certified installation partners worldwide, ensuring professional fitment and optimal performance of all components.
landing.premiumSupportDesc: Comprehensive after-sales support and technical assistance to ensure complete satisfaction with every purchase.
landing.brandsDesc: We represent over 200+ world-leading brands in performance automotive and motorcycle parts
landing.wheelsBrakesDesc: Forged wheels, brake kits, calipers, rotors
landing.carbonFiberDesc: Aero parts, interior trim, performance upgrades
landing.interiorDesc: Seats, steering wheels, roll cages, gauges
landing.upgradeDesc: Contact our specialists for personalized recommendations and expert advice on premium performance parts

hero.title: We engineer flagship builds for people obsessed with detail.
hero.subtitle: ONE COMPANY curates 200+ premium brands, integrates them with certified partner ateliers, and delivers white-glove support across 30+ countries.

narrative.title: A boutique operation with global reach
narrative.paragraph1: We started as enthusiasts building dream cars for friends. Today, we orchestrate complex performance programs for collectors, athletes, and brand houses.
narrative.paragraph2: Our team obsesses over compatibility, lead times, and installation geometry so that every component lands flawlessly and performs as promised.
narrative.paragraph3: This is not e-commerce. This is partnership—transparent sourcing, engineering rigor, and handover rituals that feel as premium as the parts themselves.

curation.title: Curated brand access
curation.description: Direct lines to world-leading manufacturers with priority allocations, limited runs, and bespoke finishes.

integration.title: Integration & visualization
integration.description: CAD reviews, fitment checks, and visualization decks ensure every upgrade complements the original design language.

partnerNetwork.title: Partner atelier network
partnerNetwork.description: Certified body, paint, and performance partners across Europe, the US, and the Middle East for flawless execution.

consulting.title: Advisory
consulting.description: Lifestyle-oriented consultations that map goals, budgets, and timelines before the first part is ordered.

procurement.title: Procurement
procurement.description: Supply-chain management with consolidated logistics, customs handling, and condition reports on arrival.

installation.title: Installation & QA
installation.description: On-site technical oversight plus multi-point QA so every build leaves aligned, calibrated, and warrantied.

aftercare.title: Aftercare
aftercare.description: Lifecycle support covering seasonal refreshes, warranty coordination, and future upgrade planning.

2007.title: Origins
2007.description: ONE COMPANY is founded in Kyiv as a bespoke sourcing outfit for European tuning houses.

2012.title: Motorcycle division
2012.description: Launch of the moto practice with dedicated partner ateliers for Ducati, BMW, and KTM builds.

2016.title: Global logistics
2016.description: First consolidated warehouse program enables climate-controlled storage and QC before delivery.

2020.title: Digital showroom
2020.description: Remote visualization decks and virtual consultations make premium tuning accessible worldwide.

2024.title: Atelier expansion
2024.description: Integrated concierge program spans automotive, moto, and lifestyle accessories under one ecosystem.

cta.title: Bring your next build to life
cta.subtitle: Send us your chassis, wishlist, and timeline—we will curate the program and coordinate the atelier.

hero.heading: Get in touch
hero.subheading: Bespoke selection for your car or motorcycle. Share the chassis, wishlist, and deadline—we will coordinate the program.

info.title: Contact information
info.description: Our specialists curate premium parts, manage logistics, and guide installations. Send a note and we will respond within one business day.
